content.value:
Rewatching Series 4 of Doctor Who because it's wonderful and Donna is such a great companion. I just got to the end of ep 1 and had the rush that was seeing Rose at the end. When I was 17 and a massive Rose fan, watching that for the first time... I about keeled over.
